overview: Loran Cehack is a spy sent from the moon to scout out Earth, whom they plan to invade. He grows to love Earth as his true home and, after discovering a giant mech from the dark ages, he begins to defend Earth in the war. The year is C.C. 2345. Growing tensions between the Earthrace and Moonrace have spiraled into an all out war. Mankind's only hope for peace lies with a young Moonrace boy named Loran Cehack, and his mysterious Turn-A Gundam, a relic of a dark history which nearly destroyed the Earth centuries ago. As a citizen of the moon, Loran is loyal to the beautiful Queen Dianna Soreil, all the while fighting to keep the technologically superior Moonrace at bay as the pre-industrial Earthrace tries desperately to catch up.
title: Turn A Gundam I: Earth Light

original_title: 劇場版∀ガンダムII 月光蝶
overview: Following the events of the first movie, the Militia finishes restoration work on its excavated spaceship and travels to the moon to deal with Gym Ghingnham and Agrippa Maintainer, who along with Dianna Soreil form a governing triumvirate over the Moonrace. On the moon, the political situation rapidly evolves as new deals are made, setting the stage for a decisive final battle to determine the relationship between the people of Earth and the technologically advanced Moonrace.
title: Turn A Gundam II: Moonlight Butterfly

overview: A personal reflection of September 11th, 2001, combining documentary footage of lower Manhattan with voicemail messages left that morning.
title: Message Machine

overview: The skill of sword-fighting is known to two tribes, the Tribes of Light (which consists of humans living on the world's surface) and Shadow (largely part-human-part-animal creatures and monsters living in an underground city, who enjoy a lifespan five times as long as the Tribe of Light and age one-fifth as quickly). The two tribes lived in peace and harmony, their domains separated by the "Words Worth" tablet—a huge monolith slab erected by an almighty creator. Although the tablet has writing on it, neither Tribe can read the text. One day, Words Worth was mysteriously destroyed by an unknown entity; its fragments scattered among the domain of the Tribes of Shadow.
title: Words Worth: Outer Story

overview: Winner is a fictional interview gone awry, featuring a reticent sweepstakes winner who doggedly avoids receiving her prize and manages to morph an ad spot into a mini documentary about her art work.
title: Winner

overview: Terra Incognita is a lensless film whose cloudy pinhole images create a memory of history. Ancient and modern explorer texts of Easter Island are garbled together by a computer narrator, resulting in a forever repeating narrative of discovery, colonialism, loss and departure.
title: Terra Incognita

overview: Short film by Romanian director.
title: Telephone Number Temporarily Suspended

overview: The Barfly is a bar where inhibitions melt and strangers share the strangest stories. There are no secets at The Barfly. It's no secret that when a director like Michael Raven gets his hands on a star like Devon, anything can happen. And it does.
title: Barfly

overview: An Autumn Diary, a winning modern romance which takes inspiration - and even some footage - from the classic An Autumn's Tale, which starred Chow Yun Fat and Cherie Chung! Wing is a young woman who has patterned her romantic ideals after an old diary she discovered fourteen years ago. Within the diary's pages is recounted a heartwarming romantic tale of a young woman, who finds love with an uncouth country hick who, deep down, is a true gentleman.
title: An Autumn Diary

overview: As a continuation of contemporary stage plays which characterize the lives and issues of both teens and adults. This stageplay is an original drama of a family under pressure: a wife and mother balancing career and family; a father with a failing business and a son struggling with the legacy of destructive attitudes passed down from generation to generation.
title: Like Father, Like Son

overview: Directed by Ludovic Spenard
title: Le Diamant Des Damnes

overview: Working Stiff is a black comedy about one zombie's lonely pursuit of unrequited love. Bill has a crush on Sheryl, the Goth girl who frequents the video store where he works. When he ends his life to prove his love for her, things go from bad, to worse.
title: Working Stiff

overview: A mockumentary about gerbils.
title: Wüstenspringmaus

overview: "In her day-in-the-life portrait of an African-American woman, Simpson uses tropes of cinema, diary, and surveillance. The portrait appears on 31 12-by-9-inch flat video screens arrayed on a gallery wall to resemble a month on a calendar: a row of three screens tops four rows of seven screens. Each video runs about 20 minutes and appears to chronicle the events of a single day; most shots last around five seconds and the streams of imagery are not synchronized, so viewers face a kinetic panorama." -Bill Stamets
Early Shahram Mokri short film, for which he won Best Director at the 2007 Noor Iranian Film Festival
title: The Dragonfly Storm

original_title: There Was an Old Lady Who Swallowed a Fly
overview: There was an old lady who swallowed a fly, and no one knows why. What else can this old lady fit in her stomach?
title: There Was an Old Lady Who Swallowed a Fly

overview: Man-Li always lives in the normal track as everybody considers. After graduating from school to society, she keeps each job with caution and fear. Unless she finds a new job, she won’t quit the current one easily. This time is quite different. She resigned and had no idea what to do next. She just thought to make a change of her lifestyle. However, what will it look like? She doesn’t know either. Her boyfriend proposed the thought of getting married. She doesn’t feel like working but it doesn’t necessarily mean that she has to choose marriage. All of this is because of the space she longs for. On the contrary, she doesn’t know what to do. Only she can do is in a daze!Waves kept patting the seashore of the night dream……a feeling was gradually brewed, swelled, unlimitedly developed and grew in strength! What does the voice of waves in the dream draw on earth?
title: Voice of Waves

overview: In a village in the north, the life of a family is turned upside down : the mother's affair denounced by her opportunistic son, and the father weighed down by his failing business.
title: The Main Game

overview: Volume 2 features a series of American secretaries SO HOT that it outsold the first edition!
title: Nude Secretaries 2

overview: Celebrate the season Scooby-Doo style as Scooby-Doo and the Mystery, Inc. gang face off festive frights, frosty nights and - jeepers - the ghost of Christmas, who wants to wish everyone a scary Christmas!  In this collection of cold-weather capers, Scooby-Doo and the gang unwrap a series of mysteries in order to stop a group of chilling crooks from stealing the spirits of the season!
tagline: 'Tis the season to be Scooby!
title: Scooby-Doo! Winter WonderDog

overview: When handsome young writer William finds himself plagued by writer's block, his best friend Max suggests that he take his mind off things and they go on a hunt for secret bordello, apparently hidden deep within the Mojave desert. When they discover a hidden oasis of sexual fantasy and obsession, founded in the age-old traditions of pleasure and satisfaction. And after the two meet beautiful Jewel and Romance, they start an ultimate trip to desire.
tagline: Only a chosen few can glimpse behind the doors.
title: Bordello Exposed

overview: Joshua Oppenheimer reimagines a sixty-second stock market update as maniacal monologue by a mumbling madman giving a bizarre play-by-play of floor traders and urban pedestrians as the trading day comes to an end. Created while in the midst of production on the feature-length GLOBALIZATION TAPES, this brief film is Oppenheimer's most concentrated piece of socio-political commentary: a quick, colorful political cartoon of capitalism plucked out-of-context and set to a soundtrack that is both comic and somewhat sinister. The upbeat musical accompaniment only enhances the empty celebration of meaningless activity.
title: Market Update

original_title: A Brief History of Paradise as Told by the Cockroaches
overview: They say that when the Earth is destroyed beyond habitation, the only survivors will be the cockroaches. Filmmaker Joshua Oppenheimer gives the indomitable insects the floor in this perversely comic commentary on affluence and self-destruction. Leashed with thin ribbons, a small intrusion of cockroaches scramble over magazine spreads of the good life while a schizophrenic pest voice-over mutters like an asylum inmate recalling the good old days, when food was plentiful and the roach traps were the enemy. It is consumption and consumerism as empty activity and madness, played-out as a natural history documentary in the guise of an invasion picture, all set to the theme song from LOVE STORY.
title: A Brief History of Paradise as Told by the Cockroaches

overview: Enjoy the latest scorching addition to the classic "Splash Shots" series from Falcon, featuring the return of classic Falcon man Jim Bentley, star of the first episode in the "Splash Shots"! Steam up the season with twelve of the hottest stars in an erotic extravaganza sure to stretch your speedos! Don't miss Falcon Exclusives Roland Dane, Justin Dragon, Josh Weston, Tommy Brant and Josh Harting in addition to seven other sultry studs who know how to keep you hot and dripping no matter what the weather outside!
title: Splash Shots 3: To the Hilt

overview: Ka-shing has lived his entire life as a luckless guy, until one day he is offered a job by Spring, a gang brother. Spring is a gambler, and turns Ka-shing's bad luck into a Philosopher's Stone. Kau, Spring's enemy, suffers a huge loss at his casino, and vows to get rid of both of them. Kau orders his men to twist Ka-shing's luck by destroying his Feng Shui. But is it all just a gimmick to win the gambling competition, or will Ka-shing surely lose his gambling abilities?

production_companies.name: The Storm Riders Management Co. Ltd.

title: The Conman 2002

overview: A young man is haunted by a nocturnal demon who may or may not be the woman he loves.
title: Stalker

overview: Donya is a wealthy woman but she is not living a happy life, she goes to a psychiatrist and starts telling him the story of her life; how she has gotten married and widowed three times.
title: The Lucky Bride

overview: A Comedy of Manners. Bad Manners. She's a glam brat that can take a splat, splat.
title: Bad Thoughts

overview: A short film from Sweden, filled with African rhythms and a wry sense of humor, that challenges society's preconceived stereotypes, and portrays a magical moment in an otherwise ordinary day.
title: Sam's Orchestra

overview: A Russian stop-motion adaptation of  The Tale of the Fisherman and the Fish.
title: About the Fisherman and the Fish

overview: Beth has the perfect life. She's beautiful, sophisticated, worldly and wealthy, sounds great right? But there's one small problem: Her marriage. Her husband Roger is a complete bore in and out of the sack and Beth is sick of it. Beth wants a way out of her marriage. A chance to live, have fun, live dangerously! One day, on her way home, Beth runs into Ivy stranded on the side of the road. Once the two women start talking, they realize they have something in common--a miserable marriage. Together the two women plan a scheme that will not only get them out of their marriages, but assure them financial security as well. What they soon learn though is that even the best plans backfire. Be careful what you wish for, it just might come true and you may end up getting screwed.
tagline: See how the other half lives
title: Restless

overview: Smilingüido and Piriá go out into the woods to do research for Mestre Formisã's class. What they do not know is the great discovery they would make: an invasion of the Sauvitas Ants in a large area of the forest. The two friends need to run to tell the queen what is happening, leaving the Formigamigas before an impasse: Did the Sauvites break the agreement? What if the Sauvites do not back down?
title: Smilinguido em A Invasão

overview: The Disc of Sorrow gets installed.
title: The Disc of Sorrow

overview: Suddenly, in the cramped boiler room, a pressure-relief valve opens and discharges steam. Then, a certified technician approaches to perform a routine check. But, is he wearing his factory mask?
title: Factory Mask

overview: A pig walks.
title: The Pig Walks

overview: As the questions are revealed we zoom onto the static image of Laura Palmer.
title: Laura Palmer

overview: Matías Piñeiro's first film, produced when he was a film student.
title: A Silent Woman

overview: Boo Boo wants to befriend a new gang of bears that moved into the park but they decide to bully him instead leaving Ranger Smith to come to the rescue.
title: Boo Boo and the Man

overview: In the mysterious jungles of Costa Rica a young girl on Spring Break runs into weird Jungle Vampires from Outer Space. It can only mean "Skin Eating Jungle Vampires." The "Witch Doctor" predicts Death for all.
title: Skin Eating Jungle Vampires

original_title: Circle of Fire: The Dark Lord Kylnor
overview: The land is being taken over by the Dark Lord Kylnor. The people need help of the elves to save them. The Circle of Power is a necklace of power and only one can retrieve it.
title: Circle of Fire: The Dark Lord Kylnor

original_title: Bear in the Big Blue House LIVE! - Surprise Party
overview: It's Tutter's birthday and viewers are invited to join Bear and the gang in the Big Blue House as they work together to plan a surprise party for Tutter. This stage production features many of the voices from the show and many of its songs as well.
tagline: Join Bear live on stage for a surprise party!
title: Bear in the Big Blue House LIVE! - Surprise Party

overview: A Tom Tom Chaser is Jacobs' 2002 poetic riff on the transformation of his classic film Tom Tom the Piper's Son from chemical to electronic form during the telecine process.
title: A Tom Tom Chaser

original_title: Secret History of the Dividing Line
overview: Paired texts as dueling histories; a journey imagined and remembered; 57 mileage markers produce an equal number of prospects. The latest in a series of films about the division of landscapes, objects, people, ideas and the Byrd family of Virginia during the early 18th century. —David Gatten
title: Secret History of the Dividing Line

overview: Some witnesses see a bank robbery heist with their own two eyes however the surveillance cameras might be telling more then there is to the story.
title: Fueling The Fire
